snippet: The authorities said a 67-year-old woman beat her 80-year-old husband to death with a crowbar, then tried to kill herself by setting her car on fire.
abstract: Unnamed Staten Island woman beats her husband, Frank Baldassarre, to death with a crowbar before attempting suicide by setting her car on fire; remains in police custody after receiving treatment for smoke inhalation.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said a 67-year-old woman beat her 80-year-old husband to death with a crowbar, then tried to kill herself by setting her car on fire.

headline.main: Staten Island Woman Kills Husband, Police Say
headline.print_headline: S.I. Woman Kills Husband, Police Say
